title: Employment Authorization Documents (EAD, I-766)
dataVerified: Name, photo, A-number, work authorization category, valid from-to dates, card number
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: I-9 verification; prevents fake EADs; USCIS domain binding. Common for DACA recipients, asylum applicants, and others awaiting permanent status. Frequent renewals make digital verification critical. Cardholders don't need to carry physical EAD reducing loss risk.
